data.text: The game is fine so far. A very non intrusive tutorial pointing you in the right direction and nice art. So far no real gameplay which is a bummer. Personally, I would like to see a mode where you have to manually control your units to choose their attacks, for example hard difficulty raids. The free draws are actually in the game, although not to the extent you may want. You get x10 summons free per day, which is better than any other game I've seen offering those "10,000 draws" which is a lie.
data.replyText: Thank you for your feedback! I've taken note of your suggestion. I will forward it to the appropriate team so that it can be taken into consideration. We very much appreciate your support!! C: If you have any other suggestions, or even ideas to share, please feel free to contact us at any time.

data.text: I've been waiting for this game to leave beta for a while, and saw an ad for it about a week before it launched. The art style had changed for the better by a lot, but I could still recognize its soul as being the same game, even with its name being different. 10/10 great unit collector, beautiful art, the premise isn't anything groundbreaking, but its executed well, and I like the story so far

data.text: So far, the game is great! The colors and art are nice to look at, especially the designs of the characters.. The story progression is decent and even though this game has a lot of microtransactions, they don't shove it in your face like other games! (Yay) only thing about it is that the story is kinda generic but that's just me lol great game

data.text: 3d AFK arena clone with less features and even more monetization options for your own enjoyment. At least there aren't any adds but plenty of popup packages that randomly show up and conveniently have the buy button where the 'accept rewards' button is on the activity they are on. A lot of micromanaging too instead of a pure idle game. Disappointed as I was looking forward to this games theme.
data.replyText: Dear player,we apologize if your gaming experience hasn't been satisfactory. We're open to any suggestions you may have to enhance your gameplay and we'll do our utmost to make improvements. Please share your ideas with us and we'll strive to optimize your gaming experience.

data.text: Enjoy it very much. It's easy and not too hard . Monster designs r cute, cool, or all the above. I don't like the Gacha system much, but at least it's not too bad to where I can't get good monsters🙂 I will also add that hopefully in future updates the monsters can evolve into different forms when they reach a certain level. Would love to see wat type of designs u guys could come up with if u guys wanted to do that🤩

You are an integral part of our community, and we sincerely value your involvement.^^

data.text: So far, so good. it's not really unique, though.
Still early on but I enjoy the art style
data.replyText: Thank you for your encouragement and support of our game. We will continue to improve the game and try our best to give you a better game experience!
